overview: Dquip has planned, constructed and implemented Design, Consulting & Web Solutions that not only meet our client’s needs, but also exceed their expectations and earn their trust. Our team of professionals are as well versed in the art of interpersonal communication and problem solving as they are in the language of technology. We identify and define processes for every function while also being nimble to change. Our processes are definite yet flexible. Additionally we are obsessively compulsive when it comes to process automation. We are in the rigorous process of automating all business functions and strive to operate in a totally paperless environment. Our process orientation, agility and automation drive, have allowed us to scale indefinitely.
